name: Armlet of Mordiggian
description: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

abilities.name: Unholy Strength
abilities.description: While active, grants the wielder strength, attack damage, and armor. The attack damage bonus is granted instantly, the strength bonus granted gradually over a short delay, while the armor bonus is granted after the delay.
notes: Does not interrupt channeling abilities upon toggling
The strength bonus grants 550 health and 2.5 health regeneration
Grants 25 main attack damage to strength heroes, 11.25 to universal heroes
Health drain is not lethal and stops while invulnerable
Upon toggling off, all bonuses are lost instantly including current health bonus
Takes 13.75 seconds for health cost to overcome bonus health
Strength bonus increases current health by 550 total once all strength is gained
Health bonus is not considered a heal but is prevented by Ice Blast

additionalInfo: Attack damage, attack speed, armor, and health regeneration bonuses of multiple Armlets of Mordiggian do not stack
